description: A Python library for phylogenetics and phylogenetic computing reading, writing, simulation, processing and manipulation of phylogenetic trees (phylogenies) and characters.

info.Author:: Jeet Sukumaran and Mark T. Holder
info.Keywords:: phylogenetics phylogeny phylogenies phylogeography evolution evolutionary biology systematics coalescent population genetics phyloinformatics bioinformatics

longdescription: A Python library for phylogenetics and phylogenetic computing reading, writing, simulation, processing and manipulation of phylogenetic trees (phylogenies) and characters.
